product_name: Smith Scope Snow Goggles - Black/White Data Frame
long_description: The Smith Scope Black/White Data snow goggles feature a rose copper tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value. RC36 lens tint combines rose and copper base tints to improve depth perception, increase contrast and cut glare in all conditions; allows 36% visible light transmission. Vents at the top of the cylindrical lens help combat fogging. Cushy single-layer face foam offers a good seal against your face. Extra-wide adjustable strap is backed with a silicone bead so it stays in place on your helmet. The Smith Scope snow goggles fit medium-size faces and come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: The Smith Scope Black/White Data snow goggles feature a rose copper tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value.
